name: HelenOS 0.11.2
body: This release brings the new port to AArch64-based HiKey960 single-board computer, the new Navigator (file manager), improvements to the user interface, improvements to text-mode support (including EGA mode and serial console) and improved text editor.

name: HelenOS 0.11.1
body: The highlight of the release is the rewrite of the GUI stack.

name: HelenOS 0.9.1
body: This release brings support for a new 64-bit architecture and improves usability of HelenOS on several already supported platforms. It also extends support for dynamic linking to more architectures.

name: HelenOS 0.7.2
body: This release brings new features such as USB 3.x support and C++14 runtime. For more details, read the detailed [release notes](http://www.helenos.org/wiki/ReleaseNotes/0.7.2).
